message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable item. I believe it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $20000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. I'm willing to pay that price for this unique item.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $22000. It's a unique item, and I believe it's worth every penny.
I understand that the product is unique, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $18000 for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to compromise, so I'll offer it to you for $20500. It's a fair price, considering the product's value.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to offer $18500 for the product, which is a bit above my initial offer, but I think it's a fair price considering the value you're placing on it.

I see you're willing to meet me at $18500, Bob. I appreciate that. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll offer it to you for $20000. It's a fair price, considering the value I'm looking for.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to offer $19000 for the product, which is my absolute maximum. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

I understand you've reached your maximum, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $20000. I'm willing to give you one last chance to meet me at this price, but if not, I'll have to consider other options.
